name: 蕭劉賢
objective:
先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意
Theoretical and Actual Combustion Processes, First-Law Analysis of Reacting Systems, Criterion for Chemical Equilibrium,The Equilibrium Constant for deal-Gas Mixtures, Air-Standard Assumptions, Otto Cycle, Diesel Cycle, Stirling and Ericsson Cycles, Brayton Cycle, Thermodynamics of high-speed gas flow, Stagnation Properties of a Fluid Stream, Mach Number of Steam at High Velocity,          Gas Flow through a Converging-Diverging Duct, Air Flow through a Converging-Diverging Nozzle, Gas Mixtures, Properties of Gas Mixtures, The Reversed Carnot Cycle, The Vapor-Compression Refrigeration Cycle,  Gas Refrigeration Cycles, Absorption Refrigeration Systems Specific and Relative Humidity of Air, Dew-Point Temperature, Air-Conditioning Processes使學生了解燃料及燃燒，基本熱傳理論，蒸汽動力廠，壓縮機，燃氣輪機，內燃機，汽油引擎，柴油引擎，冷凍空調循環。
schedule:
1.introduction
2.1st Law for C.M.,1st Law for C.V.
3.Nozzle and Diffuser
4.Turbine and Compressor
5.Throttle Valve , Mixing chamber, Heat Exchanger and pipe flow
6.2nd Law , efficiency of heat engine, and coefficient of performance of refrigerator/heat pump
7. EER , PPM1 , PPM2
8. Carnot Cycle and Carnot Heat Engine , Entropy
9.期中考
10.air-standard cycle , Otto cycle
11.Diesel cycle , dual cycle
12.Stirling cycle , Ericsson cycle , Brayton cycle
13.gas turbine , jet-propulsion cycle
14. Rankine cycle , reheat and regeneration
15.cogeneration , combined gas-vapor cycle
16.Carnot refrigerator/Carnot heat pump , real refrigerator cycle 
17. Gas Mixtures, Properties of Gas Mixtures 
18.期末考
scorePolicy: 作業/課堂表現20%, 期中考40%, 期末考40%
materials: Thermodynamics an Engineering Approach , 4th Edition , by : Yunus A. Cengel, Michael A. Boles , McGraw Hill出版 ; 中文譯本:陳呈芳翻譯 ,高立書局出版
